name: cphngp

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c0, cnlm))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ CPreHil, c0 ∈ NrmGrp, c0 ∈ NrmMod)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c0, cngp))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c0, cnlm))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cnlm), wcel(c0, cngp))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CPreHil → c0 ∈ NrmGrp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CPreHil → c0 ∈ NrmMod)
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmMod → c0 ∈ NrmGrp)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c0, cngp))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c0, cnlm))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cnlm), wcel(c0, cngp))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CPreHil → c0 ∈ NrmGrp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CPreHil → c0 ∈ NrmMod)
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmMod → c0 ∈ NrmGrp)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c0, cngp))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cnlm), wcel(c0, cngp))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CPreHil → c0 ∈ NrmGrp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmMod → c0 ∈ NrmGrp)

comment: A subcomplex pre-Hilbert space is a normed group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)
